title: Readers back AI push but oppose union regulation
description: Readers backed artificial intelligence as a way to lift productivity and boost the economy, but almost half said they did not support union involvement in AI regulation.

title: Bill to criminalise AI child abuse apps to be introduced to parliament
description: MP Kate Chaney is set to introduce a bill to criminalise the use of AI tools purpose-built to create child sexual abuse material, with the independent saying the urgent issue cannot wait for the government's wider response to artificial intelligence.
content:

title: The US and China will go head-to-head in the battle to bring about artificial general intelligence
description: The AI battle between China and the US is less about profits and return on investment, and more about geopolitics — national machismo, security and defence.
content:
Artificial intelligence is no longer just a race among a group of over-valued American tech companies and over-yachted billionaires.
It's still that, but it's now also part of the great contest between the US and China.

title: UN tech chief wants AI regulated
